features: 【Largest Gel Cushion in the Market】Tired of small, thin office chair seat cushion which doesn't fit your seats, trying office chair cushions for back and butt is specially designed the largest seat cushions in the market. The extra large office chair pad measures 20 x 20 x 2 inches that fits your car seat, wheel chair and desk chair cushion.

【Pressure Sores Relief】 Soreness and numbness caused by sedentary is because your chair is too stiff. Tailbone pressure relief seat cushion offers quick pain relief while keeping your bum coolness and ventilation when your sciatica is raging, tailbone is aching and butt is sweating. Gel cushions for pressure sores helps with coccyx pain, sciatica, back, hip, tailbone pain, hemorrhoid, pressure sores, butt pain and bed sores.

【Fits Most Types of Seats】Gel seat cushion is suitable for all kinds of chairs or seats. Chair pads provide comfortable support whether is at home or kitchen, in the office or the gym, on an airplane or a train. This is a gel seat cushion for truck drivers, seat cushion for desk chair, car seat cushions for driving butt pain, recliner cushions for elderly, wheelchair cushions for seniors, bleacher cushions for adults and also a portable gel seat pad for flights, airlines and travelling.

【Cool & Breathable】 Car seat cushion pad with honeycomb design allows for breathability to reduce heat dissipation. When car seats get hot in the summer, car seat cooling pad bring you ultimate coolness and keep the sweat away.

【Private & Convenient】Public seat sometimes has an embarrassing hygiene conditions. You can take egg crate seat cushion with non-slip cover as your personal sitting pillow. The gel seat cushions are water resistant and the zippered breathable cover is washable. Just remove the cover and toss in the washing machine.

ANTI-SLIP COVER ZIPPER DESIGN MACHINE WASHABLE AND EASY TO CLEAN

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect wheel chair cushion
reviews.reviewText: This cusion never goes flat. It constantly restores size and softness every time you move. I have a tendancy to fall a lot and this cusion helps get me up. I push my chair up against a solid area so it can’t move and place my knees on the cusion to pull up to a standing position by pulling myself upright with my chair.I have used it three times to pull myself up and get into my chair. I have tried other cushions and they flatten and slip on the floor. This cushion is perfect for people with disabilities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought it for a new chair that is too hard for my liking but didn't work there. It made the chair too high for me. It came jammed in the box. So when I put it on the chair it was not flat and not as large as the ad said. Before I sent it back I tried it in my car. It works perfect for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps so much!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this because my work delivery truck seat is worn out af. I started getting severe pain on my right side from the uneven wear on the seat. I think this seat cushion is going to work great. I used it one day so far and it was so much better. I will update if that changes. I think it feels amazing for now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as sturdy as I had hoped. Left marks on my legs.
reviews.reviewText: I'm a larger person. I bought an office chair that also accommodated larger people, however the seat compressed very quickly. My husband had a Purple mat like this, but it was much smaller. I liked the support it gave and decided to find a bigger one for myself. I love the size of this, and if you are on the lighter side, it's probably fine. The cushion just collapsed when sat on. Beyond that, the front would squish out and was uncomfortable below my legs. It's not a bad cushion, and the size is great, but for a larger person, I don't recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Misshapen, too firm
reviews.reviewText: Was hoping this would be a great budget friendly option to my purple cushion but it's not. Yes, purple is overpriced but it's also a hell of a lot more comfy than this thing that somehow gets tangled and uneven inside the fabric cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits chair well.
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable . Great color . Easy to clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, but slippery
reviews.reviewText: I immediately noticed the comfort this cushion added to my desk chair. The concern is that the cushion slipped as I shifted in the chair. When I rose from the chair, it would slide forward and often fall to the floor. I solved the sliding issue by purchasing stretch cords with hooks on the ends. I placed one vertically across the center of the cushion, then stretched it under the chair and hooked the ends to each other, then I did the same horizontally. I don't notice the cords when I'm sitting, and the cushion can no longer slide around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for wheelchair cushion
reviews.reviewText: Bought this 20x20 version for my dads wheelchair. He will try to “ slide” off the seat at times .. this works very well as an additional cushion while keeping him from sliding off the seat! This size is the same as the chair seat !
I ordered 20*20 inches seat but received 18.5* 17.5 inches seat which is wrong size. This happened three times when i ordered seats i got wrong size and quality is not as good as mentioned
